name: Unsportsmanlike
description:
Game made for United Game Jam 2020.

Instructions

Reach second place any way you can!

You are the red character.

Controls

W/S = Move up/Down

Spacebar = Increase speed

E = Place trap

P = Pause game

Collect crates to collect more traps and collect steroids to increase speed.

Assets

All art made by me in Aseprite.
